titleStmt.title: A brief relation of Sr. Walter Ralegh's troubles, with the taking away of the lands and castle of Sherborne in Dorset from him and his heires, being his indubitable inheritance
titleStmt.author: Raleigh, Carew, 1605-1666.

notesStmt.note: A petition to the House of Commons.
"The humble petition of Carew Raleigh, Esq., only son of Sir Walter Raleigh, late deceased"--P. 1.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
